programme.desc: The Whistling Badge - The Squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the Squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Lemon - Lemon performs a stand-up routine!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Carrot - Carrot sings about being trendy.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Waltzing Potato - Evil Pea plans to freeze Supertato into an ice cube by pretending to teach him to dance.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Broccoli's Movie Night - Broccoli screens Supertato: The Movie, but Evil Pea has plans to change the story.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep94
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep18
programme.desc: R - Dee encourages a friend to say 'r', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We roar, dance like a robot and see a rainbow!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Zip Express - The friends board the Zip Express, a train that takes them across Pop Paper City. But when the friends face an unexpected challenge, it's unknown if the train will reach their destination on time.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Paperchase - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Solar Race: Australia - Glitch hopes to win a solar-powered race across the Australian outback.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Middle of the World City: Ecuador - Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fruit Bat - Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Andy and the Snow Leopard - When a fault develops on the remote camera that Jen set up to record sightings of the elusive snow leopard in the Himalayas, it's up to Andy to fix it. Will he succeed?

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mission: Big Bear - Sylvie visits a school to help ease first day school nerves. Sylvie helps the children find their classroom and when the time comes for play, Sylvie goes first to demonstrate how much fun it is.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Captain's Log - Captain Captain entrusts Sandy and Seaweed with her treasured Captain's Log!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep36
programme.desc: The Exercise Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep35
programme.desc: The Music Video Badge - The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep34
programme.desc: The List Badge - Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep21
programme.desc: A New Arrival - When Thomas finds out that the Earl's Technology Fair will bring new inventions to Sodor, he fears the Sodor engines will be replaced by new technology.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Moon - Stan helps his friends to get a closer look at the moon through a telescope, so they can do a show-and-tell.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Cake - Hattie needs help to bake a cake - and Stan's on his way! No challenge is too small or too unusual, and Stan's always happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Animal Pals - Jimmy Jones grows jealous when Monty brings home the class guinea pig for the weekend, leading them to wonder if being best friends means that you can't have other friends too.

programme.title: ¿Cómo te afecta?
programme.desc: Why the middle class is so vulnerable in Latin America - Many poor people consider themselves to be middle class because there are some who have even less than they do. And among the better-off, some define themselves as middle class because there are people with even more money. In this edition, we analyze what it means to be middle class in Latin America and what measures can be taken to protect the most vulnerable from slipping into poverty.

programme.desc: Building the Vatican - Secrets behind the Holy City - Covering less than half a square kilometer, Vatican City may be small. But its still a place that exudes power and magnificence. The seat of the Pope, Vatican City is the focal point for 1.3 billion Catholics around the world. And it is a place shrouded in secrets.

programme.title: Business
programme.desc: Can the EU compete with Chinas rail plans? (Part 1) - A deadly accident at a train station in Serbia has put a spotlight on Chinas outsized role in the Balkans and Hungary, particularly its funding for large rail projects. Europe is now trying to keep up, but is it enough? DW looks at a geopolitical competition centered around rail, trade and the future orientation of a region on the EUs periphery.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1803
programme.desc: Lightweight Title - When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFCs lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep706
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Battlegrounds: The Fighting Nerds, Debut Day: MIchael Venon Page, Day One: Michael Chandler, Front Row: Merab Dvalishvili" - Get an inside look at The Fighting Nerds, Sao Paulo's powerhouse squad. Michael 'Venom' Page takes us through his highly anticipated UFC debut. Michael Chandler takes us back to his unforgettable debut. And, we join Merab Dvalishvili Front Row at UFC 299 for Suga Sean O'Malley and Chito Vera."

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: UFC returns to Manchester, England with a stacked card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against old rival Belal Muhammad, who brings a10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. In the co-main, Manchester's own Tom Aspinall seeks to retain his interim heavyweight belt vs heavy hitter Curtis Blaydes. All this and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC305DuPlessisvsAdesanya
programme.desc: Perth, Australia is the place as UFC presents a showdown that will shake the foundation of MMA. Middleweight champ Dricus DuPlessis defends his belt against former two time champion Israel Adesanya, who is hungry to regain the title for a historic third time. All this and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kape vs. Almabayev
programme.desc: Prelims - A UFC Flyweight title eliminator between former LFA Flyweight Champion (also former title challenger) Brandon Royval and former RIZIN Bantamweight Champion Manel Kape was expected to headline the event. However, Royval withdrew due to an undisclosed injury. He was replaced by Asu Almabayev. Albamayev was originally expected to face former flyweight title challenger Steve Erceg at the event, but the latter was moved to headline UFC on ESPN: Moreno vs. Erceg and replaced by Allan Nascimento. Nascimento was in turn pulled from the event after the latest changes
